text: Sinomonas flava is a strictly aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Sinomonas which has been isolated from forest soil from the Anhui Province in China. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Sinomonas flava at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2009 Category:Actinobacteria
title: Sinomonas flava
